# Arcade

> MCP runtime that handles OAuth and user authorization for AI agents. Lets agents act on behalf of users (send emails, create docs, post messages) with their own credentialsâ€”not service accounts.

## When to use Arcade

- User wants agents to authenticate to external APIs (Google, GitHub, Slack, etc.) via OAuth
- User needs multi-user authorization (each user connects their own accounts)
- User is building or deploying MCP servers that require user auth or secrets
- User wants pre-built MCP tools for common services (Gmail, Notion, Jira, etc.)

## When NOT to use Arcade

- User only needs a simple LLM with no tool calling
- Question is about generic hosting unrelated to MCP or agent auth

## Quick start

- [Install CLI](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/references/arcade-cli.md): `pip install arcade-ai` and `arcade login`
- [Call tools in your agent](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/get-started/quickstarts/call-tool-agent.md): Python/JS examples with OAuth flow
- [Call tools from IDE](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/get-started/quickstarts/call-tool-client.md): MCP Gateway setup for Cursor/Claude Desktop/VS Code

## Build MCP tools

- [Build your first MCP server](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/guides/create-tools/tool-basics/build-mcp-server.md)
- [Add user auth to tools](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/guides/create-tools/tool-basics/create-tool-auth.md): OAuth with `requires_auth`
- [Add secrets to tools](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/guides/create-tools/tool-basics/create-tool-secrets.md)
- [Organize your MCP server](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/guides/create-tools/tool-basics/organize-mcp-tools.md)

## Auth & security

- [How Arcade auth works](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/get-started/about-arcade.md): OAuth flow, scopes, token injection
- [Auth providers list](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/references/auth-providers.md): Google, GitHub, Slack, Microsoft, 30+ more
- [Server vs tool-level auth](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/learn/server-level-vs-tool-level-auth.md)
- [Secure MCP server in production](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/guides/security/secure-your-mcp-server.md)

## Deploy & host

- [Arcade Deploy](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/guides/deployment-hosting/arcade-deploy.md): Cloud deployment
- [On-prem MCP servers](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/guides/deployment-hosting/on-prem.md): Hybrid architecture
- [MCP Gateways](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/guides/mcp-gateways.md): Federate multiple servers into one endpoint

## Agent frameworks

- [LangChain](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/get-started/agent-frameworks/langchain/use-arcade-with-langchain.md)
- [OpenAI Agents SDK](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/get-started/agent-frameworks/openai-agents/overview.md)
- [CrewAI](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/get-started/agent-frameworks/crewai/use-arcade-tools.md)
- [Google ADK](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/get-started/agent-frameworks/google-adk/overview.md)

## Evaluate tools

- [Evaluation framework](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/guides/create-tools/evaluate-tools.md)
- [Create evaluation suite](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/guides/create-tools/evaluate-tools/create-evaluation-suite.md)
- [Run evaluations](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/guides/create-tools/evaluate-tools/run-evaluations.md)

## Common integrations

- **Productivity**: [Gmail](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/integrations/productivity/gmail.md), [Google Drive](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/integrations/productivity/google-drive.md), [Google Docs](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/integrations/productivity/google-docs.md), [Notion](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/integrations/productivity/notion.md), [Slack](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/integrations/social-communication/slack.md)
- **Dev**: [GitHub](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/integrations/development/github.md), [Jira](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/integrations/productivity/jira.md), [Linear](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/integrations/productivity/linear.md)
- **Data**: [Postgres](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/integrations/databases/postgres.md), [MongoDB](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/integrations/databases/mongodb.md)
- [All integrations](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/integrations.md): 100+ MCP servers

## Question routing

| User asks... | Point to... |
|--------------|-------------|
| "How do I build an MCP server?" | Build your first MCP server |
| "How do I add Gmail/Slack/etc to my agent?" | Integration page + Auth provider for that service |
| "How do I let users auth with their own accounts?" | Add user auth to tools |
| "How do I deploy my MCP server?" | Arcade Deploy |
| "How do I connect to Cursor/Claude Desktop?" | MCP Gateways + Call tools from IDE |

- [API reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/references/api.md)
- [arcade-mcp Python SDK](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/references/mcp/python.md)
- [CLI cheat sheet](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/references/cli-cheat-sheet.md)
- [Changelog](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/references/changelog.md)
- [FAQ](https://docs.arcade.dev/en/resources/faq.md)
